review: I bought this product after a good friend of mine who is a huge Netflix, YouTube, Twitch.tv user, told me about it. For $35, I feel like I'm cheating Google out of money. I have spent several hours putting a video or a show on my TV, when before I'd have to spend an hour before hand setting up a computer to do the same function. Often my family and I will sit in the lounge room with our phones out flipping through YouTube to show each other videos.Unfortunately, due to an accident, the HDMI port on our Chromecast has been damaged, and it no longer displays video. I do not see this as a fault in the Chromecast as much as a fault in HDMI, as I have seen many HDMI cables ruined in similar ways. While it could possibly be repaired, I lack both the knowledge or the tools necessary to do it. I am very pleased with the product and I have no problem purchasing another one and putting forth the measures to prevent a repeat of before.
